page.title: 19Farming Rawdon + Horsforth 2
page.content: {Crops}-the land is mainly grassland the grass being mainly used for pasture,silage or hay.Strawberries picked by the customer have become a very successful crop.Potatoes are another popular crop,picked by machine {Livestock-}horses and ponies are kept for leisure purposes and some breeding Many farmers keep hens to provide free range eggs which they sell direct to the public.There are three dairy farms in the area.Some farms keep pigs but there are no pig farms as such. Some sheep are pastured in the north of the area. {Machinery-}the farmers hire machines for haycutting etc. when they need them.
